name: skydiver
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who practises the sport of skydiving (= jumping from an aircraft with a parachute): As an experienced skydiver, he would have checked his main parachute himself before the jump. He was a skilled skydiver with numerous qualifications. See
skydiving
Mauricio Graiki/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesFellow skydivers were at a loss yesterday to explain how the incident could have happened. She was regarded as one of the best skydivers in Europe.Two of the other skydivers could see that she was trying to separate the two parachutes.
